item.title: R Source Code for Bond Analysis
item.dc:creator: Chen Xihui
item.link: https://middle-office.netlify.app/posts/2020-11-25 R Source Code for Bond Analysis
item.description: This is a highly accurate bond yield and analytics calculator. I would love to unoficially claim this to be the most accurate bond calculator found on the internet, including public R and Python packages, but not until I have completed a few enhancements first.
item.guid: https://middle-office.netlify.app/posts/2020-11-25 R Source Code for Bond Analysis
